project_descr: The purpose of Project Preparatory Grant (PPG) is to support the development of the UNDP-GEF “De-risking Renewable Energy Investment in Kazakhstan” FSP (Full Size Project)

outputs.output_descr: Support to development of UNDP-GEF “De-risking Renewable Energy Investment in Kazakhstan” Project. The project is aimed at promoting private-sector investment in large and small-scale renewable energy to achieve Kazakhstan’s renewable energy target

document_name: De-risking Renewable Energy Investment in RK
project_title: de-risking renewable energy investment in rk
